snippet: Vietnamese authorities said Friday that they were investigating the self-immolation of the mother of a prominent blogger who is in police custody awaiting trial on charges of conducting propaganda against the state.
lead_paragraph: Vietnamese authorities said Friday that they were investigating the self-immolation of the mother of a prominent blogger who is in police custody awaiting trial on charges of conducting propaganda against the state.

headline.main: Vietnam: Death of Detained Blogger’s Mother Investigated
headline.print_headline: Vietnam: Death of Detained Blogger’s Mother Investigated
